#!/bin/bash
OLDFORCPATH='/glade/work/mazrooei/jedi/ctest_jedi_workflow/site_09253000/in_forcing/'
NEWFORCPATH='/glade/work/mazrooei/jedi/ctest_jedi_workflow/site_09253000/Forcing/'
for i in `ls $OLDFORCPATH`; do
echo ${i##*/}
ncks -O -d x,1477,1507 -d y,2058,2091 ${OLDFORCPATH}/${i} ${NEWFORCPATH}/${i##*/}
done
